post:
Hello everyone. We are back with some LET offers for this month.

# Locations:
* Buffalo, NY - KVM, OpenVZ
* Dallas, TX - OpenVZ
* Hampshire, UK - OpenVZ

# Test Servers:
* Buffalo, NY - ny.test.simplydigitalhosting.com
* Dallas, TX - tx.test.simplydigitalhosting.com
* Hampshire, UK - uk.test.simplydigitalhosting.com

# OpenVZ

## 256 MB Plan
* 256 MB RAM
* 512 MB VSWAP
* 5 GB HDD
* 500 GB bandwidth
* 1 IPv4 IP
* 1 vCore

Price: $2

Order: [Click Here](https://www.simplydigitalhosting.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=24)

SSD Price: $2.50

Order: [Click Here](https://www.simplydigitalhosting.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=123)

* 512 MB RAM

Price: $4

SSD Price: $5

Order: [Click Here](https://www.simplydigitalhosting.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=124)

Have a happy Halloween!
